passives.name: Reverberate
passives.effects: After 2 seconds from the start of the combat phase in each round, gain 5 bonus health per 1% bonus attack speed.

passives.name: Resonate
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-hit deal 10% attack speed (+ 2% of your bonus health) bonus magic damage.

passives.name: Rumble
passives.effects: Immobilizing an enemy champion generates 25 stacks of Reverberation for 10 seconds, stacking up to 100 times and refreshing on-hit as well as on subsequent immobilizations. At maximum stacks and upon immobilizing an enemy, your on-hit effects are applied to them 3 times.
